str2: A primary preposition; 'fore', i.e. In front of, prior to.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: From a compound of pro and horao; to be a watcher in advance, i.e. To mount guard as a sentinel; figuratively, to hem in, protect.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To enclose, shut in, make subject to. From sun and kleio; to shut together, i.e. Include or embrace in a common subjection to.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Accusative Feminine Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
To uncover, bring to light, reveal. From apo and kalupto; to take off the cover, i.e. Disclose.
